basics.name: Tracy Bui
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2022.

education.courses: ICS 101, ICS 111, ICS 141, ICS 211, ICS 212, ICS 241, ICS 311

work.company: UH Information Technology Services - Enterprise Systems
highlights: Developing web applications using Java, Spring, Struts, JSPs, Oracle, MySQL, Eclipse.
Assist and collaborate in various project teams to develop and maintain a variety of system-wide web applications.

work.company: UH Information Technology Services - Help Desk
highlights: Answer phone calls in a timely manner to assist UH users over the phone and  respond to emails prioritizing the older messages first
Troubleshoot software, networking, hardware issues and start a remote support session to view the userâ€™s screen if necessary
Monitor network and system operations every 30 minutes in the Operations Center and check the Data Center on weekends. Notified supervisors if there were any issues that needed to be taken care of

volunteer.summary: Develop college students with a capacity for leadership
highlights: Participate in various social gatherings and engaging events to experience and explore in academic careers while developing writing and math skills
Dedicated to help students have a smooth transition from high school to incoming college freshmen and create a safe environment for them
Provided and participated in different volunteering opportunities

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
